sourcesContent:
Olá, {{ user.displayName }}

Resposta:

{{ resposta }}

Login com Google
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ChatGptService } from './chat-gpt.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chat-gpt', templateUrl: './chat-gpt.component.html', }) export class ChatGptComponent implements OnInit { user: any; prompt = ''; resposta = ''; selectedAI = ''; availableAIs: string[] = []; constructor(private chatService: ChatGptService) {} ngOnInit() { this.chatService.getSession().subscribe({ next: res => this.user = res.user, error: err => console.error(err) }); this.chatService.getAvailableAIs().subscribe({ next: res => { this.availableAIs = res.ais; if(this.availableAIs.length) this.selectedAI = this.availableAIs[0]; }, error: err => console.error(err) }); } enviarPrompt() { this.chatService.enviarPrompt(this.prompt, this.selectedAI).subscribe({ next: res => this.resposta = res.resposta, error: err => console.error(err) }); } }
